tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditional - Finished T67 at 2015 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Member of a Canadian Junior National Team...Was a 2006 Junior Americas Cup Team member...Made first career NCAA appearance in 2011 as a senior at the University of Washington...Finished T16 overall at NCAA regional.
tourBios.personal: Worked at Raymond James as an analyst for financial advisors...Made the dean's list in all but one quarter while studying at Washington...Claims to be better than Nick Taylor at Mario Kart on Nintendo 64...Dream foursome would include his dad, Tiger Woods and Rory McIlroy...Favorite golf memory is playing at his home course with his dad at night.

tourBios.carHigh: 2015: Began the season with no status on the Mackenzie Tour...Finished ninth on a sponsor's exemption at the Bayview Place Island Savings Open, earning a spot in the field at the Syncrude Boreal Open...Carded a final-round, 9-under 63 Sunday in Fort McMurray to get into a playoff with Talor Gooch and Ben Silverman...Made a 12-foot birdie putt on the third extra hole to stay alive in the playoff, then prevailed with a par on the fifth extra hole to earn victory...Finished the season with one more top-25 finish and ended the season 10th on the Order of Merit to earn an exemption into the final stage of Web.com Tour Q-School.
tourBios.personal: Worked at Raymond James as an analyst for financial advisors...Claims to be better than PGA TOUR winner Nick Taylor at Mario Kart on Nintendo 64...Dream foursome would include his dad, Tiger Woods and Rory McIlroy.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was 1st in 2015 at the The Syncrude Boreal Open Presented by AECON.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T14th in Scoring Average (Actual) on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
